price: Na anawaitikia wanao amini na wakatenda mema, na anawazidishia fadhila zake. Na makafiri watakuwa na adhabu chungu.
arabic: وَيَسۡتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَيَزِيدُهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦۚ وَٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ
footnotes: Na huwaitikia Waumini kwa wanayo yaomba, na huwazidishia juu ya hayo wanayo yaomba. Na makafiri watapata adhabu yenye kufikia ukomo wa ukali na uchungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayastajību alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti wayazīduhum min faḍlihi wal-kāfirūna lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun
